entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LSP pull diagnostics should return nothing (except syntax error) prior to the workspace being fully loaded. #66761
  • Move `UseValueTuple` from `SymbolDisplayCompilerInternalOptions` to `SymbolDisplayMiscellaneousOptions` #66757
  • GetProjectDependencyGraph doesn't return dependencies #66754
  • Adjust SymbolDisplay member options behavior for interface members #66753

Closed

  • 'use auto property' codefix somethimes creates private setter for readonly fields #25408
    Backlog
  • Find All References should give a better message when not invoked on a symbol #24886
    Backlog
  • Rename dashboard counts references in shared files multiple times #12300
    Backlog
  • Improvements for Invert If refactoring #25241
    Backlog
  • Comment nodes not being renamed #25100
    Backlog
  • Verify unused strings are eventually removed from the SQLite string table #24645
    Backlog
  • Out declaration missing type in autocompletion list #21055
    Backlog
  • Formatter should remove spaces inside interpolated string braces #24498
    Backlog
  • Code formatting not working using open directory #24365
    Backlog
  • Pattern Matching: Consider using VS's algorithm for merging two or more matches #24294
    Backlog
  • Lost color on type names during copy & paste in wordprocessor #24073
    Backlog
  • VB: Structure guidelines do not show tooltips any more #24067
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CodeGeneration.AttributeGenerator is useful but internal #23838
    Backlog
  • 'CSharpAddImportCodeFixProvider' crash #23658
    Backlog
  • ExtractMethod: Weird VS 2017 15.4.4 behaviour #23401
    Backlog
  • Structure guide lines not working #23234
    Backlog
  • UseNullPropagation should handle boolean scenarios #23075
    Backlog
  • Snippets not offered in completion above usings in C# #22810
    Backlog
  • NavigateTo on resource string should also find the RESX entry #22801
    Backlog
  • [Flaky] SuppressSyntaxDiagnosticsOnTypesCSharp is flaky #22676
    Backlog
  • StateSet.ContainsAnyDocumentOrProjectDiagnostics heavy allocator #22609
    Backlog
  • UnboundIdentifiers: Bad overload resolution error for constructor call in lambda with #warning #22615
    Backlog
  • Roslyn.VisualStudio.IntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpGoToDefinition.GoToDefinitionWithMultipleResults Failure #22577
    Backlog
  • Spurious squiggle sometimes stays in the editor after error is fixed #22566
    Backlog
  • Suppressing IDE0034 does not work correctly #22506
    Backlog
  •  Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.UnitTests.WorkspaceServices.SQLitePersistentStorageTests.PersistentService_Document_WriteReadSameInstance is flakey #22437
    Backlog
  • Incorrect completion when adding an argument to an async lambda #22343
    Backlog
  • dotnet_style_qualification_for_property has faulty heuristic #22212
    Backlog
  • Intermittent test failure: VerifyReorderAndRemoveParametersAcrossLanguages #21955
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException in ReplaceMethodWithPropertyCodeRefactoringProvider #21934
    Backlog
  • Suggest out variable name #21837
    Backlog
  • Object initializer intellisense doesn't work if you implement IList #21802
    Backlog
  • Generate method into closed file hangs (but is cancellable) #21179
    Backlog
  • Typing 'new ' where a parameter with generic type is expected brings up a nonexistent type #21049
    Backlog
  • IDE0049 should be updated to suggest converting IntPtr to nint and UIntPtr to nuint. #63421
    Backlog
  • API/behavior changes needed to enable LSP pull diagnostics in 17.6 #63861
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Support 'make method async' on an unbound 'await' identifier parsed as a variable declaration. #66764
    Area-IDE
  • Move task list initialization code to BG. #66763
    Area-IDE
  • Add a test for FAR on symbol with empty name #66762
    Area-IDE
  • Discourage non-incremental source generators #66752
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Merge pull request #1 from dotnet/master #66751
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Remove all partial analysis state tracking in CompilationWithAnalyzers #66750
    Area-Analyzers, Tenet-Performance
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to main #66749
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow razor tests to get diagnostics #66748
    Area-IDE
  • Fix OnInitialized #66747
    Area-IDE
  • Track status for "roles" feature #66746
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Give a better message in FAR when not invoked in an ok location #66759
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix rename-dashboard to not overreport results in linked-files #66756
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix codegen for 'use auto prop' with linked files #66760
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Avoid searching for any empty identifier in Find All References #66758
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix completion in out-var with variable directly declared after #66755
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Allow multiple handlers on the same class in ClaSP #66688
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update 'Prefer Language/Framework type' to support IntPtr/nint. #66742
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Handle captured primary constructor parameters in readonly context. #66685
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Allow `interface_body` and `enum_body` to consist of just a `;`. #66720
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #66744
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix XmlDocumentationProvider to return the entire XML node #66668
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66766
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Targeting IDE projects to .NET 6 #66655
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
  • Add request concurrency information for processing by the RequestExec… #66727
    Area-IDE
  • Copy all diagnostic info from derived classes when changing severity of a diagnostic #66038
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix MSBuildWorkspace report warnings as failure #66710
    Area-IDE
  • Create a README for CLaSP #66083
    Area-IDE
  • Update 17.5 to GA #66732
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Record added node output states as new #66725
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Parsing for role and extension type declarations #66728
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove some outdated configurations in tools #52800
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • SymbolDisplay show modifiers for default interface implementations and static abstract members #66712
    Area-Compilers
  • Tweak LSIF's MSBuild discovery logic #66709
    Area-IDE
